data.event: It had 327 inhabitants in 2004 divided into 15 small villages (lugares).

event.title: are characterized by their Oceanic climate (Csf), with tendencies to have some summer

data.event: The lands of Lira, with mild temperatures and rainfall usual throughout the year; are characterized by their Oceanic climate (Csf), with tendencies to have some summer drought, influence of the warm-summer Mediterranean climate (Csb).
